# [Interview #99: TPOD Signing Report - Scott Cantor, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=99#3)

#### Scott Cantor

I didn't stay too long, but I had a good time, and just wish he had stopped in Columbus as well.

Scott Cantor
